align-content.description: Alignment of the whole area of children on the cross axis if they span over multiple lines in this container.

align-items.description: Alignment of children on the cross axis of this container.

align-self.description: Similar to align-items, but only for this specific element.

all.description: Allows resetting all properties with the initial keyword. Does not apply to custom USS properties.

background-color.description: Background color to paint in the element’s box.

background-image.description: Background image to paint in the element’s box.

border-bottom-color.description: Color of the element’s bottom border.

border-bottom-left-radius.description: The radius of the bottom-left corner when a rounded rectangle is drawn in the element’s box.

border-bottom-right-radius.description: The radius of the bottom-right corner when a rounded rectangle is drawn in the element’s box.

border-bottom-width.description: Space reserved for the bottom edge of the border during the layout phase.

border-color.description: Shorthand for border-top-color, border-right-color, border-bottom-color, border-left-color

border-left-color.description: Color of the element’s left border.

border-left-width.description: Space reserved for the left edge of the border during the layout phase.

border-radius.description: Shorthand for border-top-left-radius, border-top-right-radius, border-bottom-right-radius, border-bottom-left-radius

border-right-color.description: Color of the element’s right border.

border-right-width.description: Space reserved for the right edge of the border during the layout phase.

border-top-color.description: Color of the element’s top border.

border-top-left-radius.description: The radius of the top-left corner when a rounded rectangle is drawn in the element’s box.

border-top-right-radius.description: The radius of the top-right corner when a rounded rectangle is drawn in the element’s box.

border-top-width.description: Space reserved for the top edge of the border during the layout phase.

border-width.description: Shorthand for border-top-width, border-right-width, border-bottom-width, border-left-width

bottom.description: Bottom distance from the element’s box during layout.

color.description: Color to use when drawing the text of an element.

cursor.description: Mouse cursor to display when the mouse pointer is over an element.

display.description: Defines how an element is displayed in the layout.

flex-basis.description: Initial main size of a flex item, on the main flex axis. The final layout might be smaller or larger, according to the flex shrinking and growing determined by the other flex properties.

flex-direction.description: Direction of the main axis to layout children in a container.

flex-grow.description: Specifies how the item will grow relative to the rest of the flexible items inside the same container.

flex-shrink.description: Specifies how the item will shrink relative to the rest of the flexible items inside the same container.

flex-wrap.description: Placement of children over multiple lines if not enough space is available in this container.

font-size.description: Font size to draw the element’s text.

height.description: Fixed height of an element for the layout.

justify-content.description: Justification of children on the main axis of this container.

left.description: Left distance from the element’s box during layout.

letter-spacing.description: Increases or decreases the space between characters.

margin.description: Shorthand for margin-top, margin-right, margin-bottom, margin-left

margin-bottom.description: Space reserved for the bottom edge of the margin during the layout phase.

margin-left.description: Space reserved for the left edge of the margin during the layout phase.

margin-right.description: Space reserved for the right edge of the margin during the layout phase.

margin-top.description: Space reserved for the top edge of the margin during the layout phase.

max-height.description: Maximum height for an element, when it is flexible or measures its own size.

max-width.description: Maximum width for an element, when it is flexible or measures its own size.

min-height.description: Minimum height for an element, when it is flexible or measures its own size.

min-width.description: Minimum width for an element, when it is flexible or measures its own size.

opacity.description: Specifies the transparency of an element and of its children.

overflow.description: How a container behaves if its content overflows its own box.

padding.description: Shorthand for padding-top, padding-right, padding-bottom, padding-left

padding-bottom.description: Space reserved for the bottom edge of the padding during the layout phase.

padding-left.description: Space reserved for the left edge of the padding during the layout phase.

padding-right.description: Space reserved for the right edge of the padding during the layout phase.

padding-top.description: Space reserved for the top edge of the padding during the layout phase.

position.description: Element’s positioning in its parent container.

right.description: Right distance from the element’s box during layout.

top.description: Top distance from the element’s box during layout.

transform-origin.description: The transformation origin is the point around which a transformation is applied.

transition.description: Shorthand for transition-delay, transition-duration, transition-property, transition-timing-function

transition-delay.description: Duration to wait before starting a property’s transition effect when its value changes.

transition-duration.description: Time a transition animation should take to complete.

transition-property.description: Properties to which a transition effect should be applied.

transition-timing-function.description: Determines how intermediate values are calculated for properties modified by a transition effect.

-unity-background-image-tint-color.description: Tinting color for the element’s backgroundImage.

-unity-background-scale-mode.description: Background image scaling in the element’s box.

-unity-font.description: Font to draw the element’s text, defined as a Font object.

-unity-font-definition.description: Font to draw the element’s text, defined as a FontDefinition structure. It takes precedence over -unity-font.

-unity-font-style.description: Font style and weight (normal, bold, italic) to draw the element’s text.

-unity-overflow-clip-box.description: Specifies which box the element content is clipped against.

-unity-paragraph-spacing.description: Increases or decreases the space between paragraphs.

-unity-slice-bottom.description: Size of the 9-slice’s bottom edge when painting an element’s background image.

-unity-slice-left.description: Size of the 9-slice’s left edge when painting an element’s background image.

-unity-slice-right.description: Size of the 9-slice’s right edge when painting an element’s background image.

-unity-slice-scale.description: Scale applied to an element’s slices.

-unity-slice-top.description: Size of the 9-slice’s top edge when painting an element’s background image.

-unity-text-align.description: Horizontal and vertical text alignment in the element’s box.

-unity-text-outline.description: Outline width and color of the text.

visibility.description: Specifies whether or not an element is visible.

white-space.description: Word wrap over multiple lines if not enough space is available to draw the text of an element.

width.description: Fixed width of an element for the layout.

word-spacing.description: Increases or decreases the space between words.
